column4: Microsoft launches US$13bn bond as high-grade hits record
column5: NEW YORK  Oct 29 (IFR) - Software giant Microsoft launched a US$13bn seven-part bond on Thursday  one of the biggest deals of the year  as US high-grade bond issuance set a new annual record.

column4: Panasonic second-quarter profit beats estimates  reassures on Tesla
column5: TOKYO Panasonic Corp's  quarterly operating profit beat estimates  bolstered by strong sales of high-margin TVs  and it sought to reassure that its battery partnership with Tesla Motors  was not threatened by rival LG Chem.

column4: UPDATE 1-Panasonic Q2 profit beats estimates  reassures on Tesla
column5: * Q2 profit jumps by nearly a third; 16 pct ahead of consensus

column4: Raytheon to buy Intel’s Stonesoft: report
column5: Raytheon Co's  Websense unit is buying Intel Corp's  Finnish cybersecurity arm  Stonesoft  according to news media reports.

column4: Raytheon to buy Intel's Stonesoft: report
column5: Oct 29 Raytheon Co's Websense unit is buying Intel Corp's Finnish cybersecurity arm  Stonesoft  according to news media reports.
